text: Hello <@U04M8KXHTNG> i'm very interested, sorry for the delay. My email is : <mailto:maxime@weelo.io|maxime@weelo.io>

Hi all, this might be a long shot but would be grateful for the help. 

Has anyone used a workflow with a custom action that:
1. Connects to you telephony system e.g. aircall/ twilio
2. Gets the latest call engagement data for a specific phone number
3. Then Logs the call activity against the contact record
My goal is to log activity incase our sales team forget to log it manually (rare occasion) or our 3rd party integration does not log the call against the record which is a known problem
Hey Carter, what did you mean by object type is 0-1? I copied the code but am receiving error messages whenever i run a test
Honestly I think you might just need to build that out in a custom code action
don't know of anyone that has built that before
would love to see if someone has though
did you test in the HubSpot ui
0-1 is the internal object id for HubSpot contacts, you use if for things like associations
No worries, thank you for sending! I will reach out to you once we have the usability test ready :slightly_smiling_face: <@U02E85T3S0K>

Hey! <@U02C6B7RPUK> Not sure if your solution ever got resolved but we now have a beta for event triggers so you can trigger on object creation and we are also working on webhook triggers if that is a potential interest?
Hey <@U04HWATMT7A>! We are currently working on webhook triggers so you can trigger on events in private apps. If you send me your email, I can add you to the beta once it’s ready

Hey Jorge! Actually on the same team with Angus :slightly_smiling_face: We now how a beta for event triggers and there is an event called “Property Change Event” I believe this is along the lines of what you’re looking for. If you send me your Hub ID, I can add you to the beta. <@U03NGDH6M0A>
